definition: all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: For instance, Christmas gifts and toys, they are exported around the world.
sentences.chinese: 例如，聖誕禮品和玩具，它們是出口世界各地。

sentences.english: I met a lot of friends, a lot of people from a lot around the world.
sentences.chinese: 我碰到很多朋友，很多人，他們來自世界各地。

sentences.english: The use of radiation sources in medical and other applications is widespread throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今世界各地普遍在醫療和其它應用中使用放射源。

sentences.english: Ithas been translated into tens of languages, spread love to all theworld.
sentences.chinese: 被翻譯成數十種語言，將愛傳至世界各地。

sentences.english: Piracy is alive and flourishing on the world's commercial sea-lanes.
sentences.chinese: 海盜行爲在世界各地的商運航線上很猖獗。

sentences.english: In this month, Muslims from all around the world fast in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 在這個月裏，世界各地的穆斯林在白天都要禁食。

sentences.english: Even so, he did what he could to greet his many friends throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 但即使這樣，他仍儘可能地向世界各地的友人問安。

sentences.english: As a magician, his reputation spread all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個魔術師，他的名聲傳播到了世界各地。

sentences.english: So, we may enjoy wonderful performances from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 那我們就能欣賞到來自世界各地的精彩演出了。

sentences.english: They attract the best students from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 它們吸引了來自世界各地的最好的學生。

sentences.english: Can be shipped armored vehicles we have for "sale" all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我們的裝甲車可以轉讓可運世界各地。

sentences.english: In her spare time, Tori likes to travel to learn new things from different parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在業餘時間，劉芳喜歡到世界各地旅遊感受新事物。

sentences.english: Business people from all over the world meet in Guangzhou at this event, exchanging business information and developing friendships.
sentences.chinese: 來自世界各地的客商雲集廣州，互通商情，增進友誼。

sentences.english: This is a major reissue of a book used by students of Vsevolod Meyerhold across the world.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個由梅耶荷德世界各地的學生用的書主要補發。

sentences.english: And deepo caves in all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 來研究世界各地的活火山和深洞。

sentences.english: Pro-gamers from all over the world have traveled to BlizzCon to participate in the Invitational .
sentences.chinese: 來自世界各地的職業選手都來參加到了這次的邀請賽。

definition: domestic and international/at home and abroad
domestic and international/at home and abroad
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
